<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Create an integration</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/integrations"}></MethodEndpoint>



Create an integration.

## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>data</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> IntegrationCreate</span><span className={"openapi-schema__divider"}></span><span className={"openapi-schema__required"}>required</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`integration`]"} schema={{"description":"The type represents the object being returned. Always `integration`.","type":"string","example":"integration","enum":["integration"],"default":"integration"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"Order shipping notification","description":"The name of the integration."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"Send a shipping notification via email with discount code","description":"A description of what the integration is for."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","example":true,"description":"Whether the integration is enabled."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"integration_type"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`webhook`, `aws_sqs`, `stomp`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Specifies how the event is delivered. The options are `webhook`, `aws-sqs`, or `stomp`.","example":"webhook","enum":["webhook","aws_sqs","stomp"],"default":"webhook"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"observes"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The list of events you want to observe. See [**Observable Events**](#observable-events).","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><strong>configuration</strong><span style={{"opacity":"0.6"}}> object</span><strong style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","color":"var(--openapi-required)"}}> required</strong></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

The content of the configuration object depends on the value of `integration_type`.

</div></div><div><span className={"badge badge--info"}>oneOf</span><SchemaTabs><TabItem label={"AWSSQSConfigurationObject"} value={"0-item-properties"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"https://sqs.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/123456789/epcc-external-queue","description":"The required SQS queue URL."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"aws_access_key_id"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"****************JIMB","description":"The required AWS access key ID."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"aws_secret_access_key"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"************************************HK4o","description":"The required AWS secret key ID."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"region"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"eu-west-1","description":"The required AWS region."}}></SchemaItem></TabItem><TabItem label={"WebhookConfigurationObject"} value={"1-item-properties"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"https://yourwebsite.com/order-created-notification","description":"A required URL that the integration fires."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"secret_key"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"secret_key_to_validate_on_your_endpoint","description":"An optional header. Useful to authenticate the response came from Elastic Path. This is sent as `X-MOLTIN-SECRET-KEY`."}}></SchemaItem></TabItem><TabItem label={"STOMPConfigurationObject"} value={"2-item-properties"}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"username"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"epcc-integration-1","description":"The username used to authenticate against a STOMP server."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"password"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"****************************CDKn","description":"The password used to authenticate against a STOMP server."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"destination"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"/queue/epcc-integrations.order-created","description":"The destination in the messaging queuing system."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"addresses"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["stomp+ssl://b-618354a5-e04f-4eff-99c7-734e9d8b91a5-2.mq.us-west-2.amazonaws.com:61614","stomp+ssl://b-618354a5-e04f-4eff-99c7-734e9d8b91a5-1.mq.us-west-2.amazonaws.com:61614"],"description":"The addresses that correspond with the destination name."}}></SchemaItem></TabItem></SchemaTabs></div></details></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Success. Integration created.

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>data</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The unique identifier of the integration.","type":"string","example":"2da46671-b4c2-44ac-b133-d1221aafc77b"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`integration`]"} schema={{"description":"The type represents the object being returned. Links are used to allow you to move between requests.

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"self"} required={false} schemaName={"uri"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Single entities use a self parameter with a link to that specific resource.","type":"string","format":"uri","example":"?page[offset]=0&page[limit]=25","title":"LinkURI"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>meta</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>timestamps</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> Timestamps</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

The date and time a transaction is created.

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"created_at"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The date and time an integration is updated.","type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2017-07-21T17:32:28Z"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"updated_at"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The date and time an integration is updated.","type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2017-07-21T17:32:28Z"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"data\": {\n    \"id\": \"2da46671-b4c2-44ac-b133-d1221aafc77b\",\n    \"type\": \"integration\",\n    \"name\": \"Order shipping notification\",\n    \"description\": \"Send a shipping notification via email with discount code\",\n    \"enabled\": true,\n    \"integration_type\": \"webhook\",\n    \"observes\": [\n      \"string\"\n    ],\n    \"configuration\": {\n      \"url\": \"https://sqs.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/123456789/epcc-external-queue\",\n      \"aws_access_key_id\": \"****************JIMB\",\n      \"aws_secret_access_key\": \"************************************HK4o\",\n      \"region\": \"eu-west-1\"\n    },\n    \"links\": {\n      \"self\": \"?page[offset]=0&page[limit]=25\"\n    },\n    \"meta\": {\n      \"timestamps\": {\n        \"created_at\": \"2017-07-21T17:32:28Z\",\n        \"updated_at\": \"2017-07-21T17:32:28Z\"\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"422"} value={"422"}><div>
